english: I'd rather die a thousand times.
We'll turn the boys against each other.
They're trying to destroy Seljuk State.
The imagination is pushing its limits.

text: ikimiz de bu işten kazançlı çıkabilecek kadar zeki insanlarız, değil mi Kurdoğlu?
english: We're both smart enough to make a profit, aren't we, Kurdoglu?
If you kill Solomon Shah and take his place
From the Crusades of Antioch, under our control
You'll get a lot of support.

text: Kardeşin yüzünden girdiğimiz savaş için talim ederken
english: While we're training for the war we went through because of your brother.
Crazy Iron's Moongirl dropped my baby

text: Ben sana demiştim bu Halep bize yaramayacak diye Gündoğdu
english: I told you this Aleppo wouldn't do us any good.
The murderer of my unborn baby!
What did you want from the innocent?
We've endured all kinds of madness.

text: Ama er ya da geç bunun bedelini ödeyeceksin
english: But sooner or later, you're gonna pay for this.

text: Can mı istersin? Kısasa kısas mı istersin?
english: You want a life, you want an eye for an eye?

text: Çok merak ettim beyim. Nerede kaldın?

english: I had Ilyas read it, sir.
...Halime Sultan is taking him to the hunting lodge.
El Aziz was taking him by force.
What is it you want to talk to me about?

text: Ben çok büyük bir günah işledim
english: I have committed a grave sin.
I can't carry this burden anymore.
Just say what you have to say.
Learn the location of Ibn Al-Arabi (Arabi)

text: Onu öldürüp sandığındaki kutsal emaneti almanı istiyorum
english: I want you to kill him and take the relic from his chest.

text: Yalnız bunu yaparken en büyük düşmanın Üstad ve Titus olacaktır
english: But in doing so, your greatest enemy will be Master and Titus.

text: Dikkatli ol Bunu yalnız ikimiz bileceğiz
english: Be careful. Only the two of us will know.

text: Numan’ı da Yiğit’i de öldürmek zorundaydın
english: You had to kill Numan. You had to kill Hero.
I know how you feel about princes.
But we don't have a choice.
Tell me if you've got it. Let's do it.

text: Kara Toygar belasından kurtulup geldiğimiz bu topraklarda…
english: In the land where we came from, free of the trouble of Black Toygar...
...we'll carry the fire to the oba, Süleyman Shah!

text: Düşman ejderha gibi üzerimize gelse de…
english: Even if the enemy comes at us like dragons...

text: …her türlü bela etrafımızı cehennem gibi sarsa da yılmayacaktık
english: ...we wouldn't be intimidated by all the trouble around us like hell.
Isn't that what our promise was?
But I see you've given up.

text: Bundan gayri cenk ederken ben size nasıl güvenirim?
english: How can I trust you when I'm fighting against this?

text: Ben size nasıl pusat verip er diye cenk meydanlarına gönderirim?
english: How can I give you a stroll and send you to the battlefield for a private?

text: Biz ne Ötüken’de verdiğimiz sözü unuttuk…
english: We forgot what we promised when we were scared...

text: Lakin sen ve evlatların beyliğin asaletini unuttu
english: But he has forgotten the nobility of you and your sons.
Even though it's raining down on us...

text: …ama size obamdan bir keçi yavrusu bile vermem
english: But I wouldn't give you a goat cub from my obama.
I've had enough of this, sir!

text: Devlet, hırsıyla tahta geçmeye çalışanı kabul etmez!
english: The government won't accept an ambitious attempt to take the throne!

text: Siyasi olarak yaptığım bu evlilikten en büyük faydayı sağlayacağıma eminim
english: I'm sure I can make the most of my political marriage.

text: Yakında göreceksiniz ne olduğunu Halime Sultan
english: Soon you'll see what happened, Halima Sultan.
We've got him, sir. Our men are bringing him in.

text: O herif seni ve aptal kardeşimi kandırıp kendine âşık etti
english: That guy tricked you and my stupid brother into falling in love with him.
Man, he even fooled my nanny.
You're gonna hurt yourself and your government.
Do you know how many of my soldiers he killed?
How many dervishes in my sheik's trailer?
Halima Sultan was heavier than all of them.

text: Ölene kadar lanetli karım olarak av köşkünde yaşayacaksın
english: You'll live in a hunting lodge as my cursed wife until you die.

text: Yaşadığın her gün günahlarının bedelini ödeyeceksin
english: Every day you live You'll pay for your sins
It's pathetic to be sad if you don't want to.
For years, we've been consumed with childsickness.
Just when we met, we lost.
♪ The fire inside of me is inexhaustible ♪ ♪ The sun is out ♪

text: Hatun olup sana bir evlat veremedim
english: I couldn't be a girl and give you a son.

Oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, God, oh, oh, God, oh, God, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, God, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh,

text: Hatun, olur mu öyle şey? O ne biçim laf
english: What kind of talk is that?
God is the Alan and the Giver.

text: Ha? Sen düşünme artık böyle şeyleri
english: Don't worry about that stuff anymore.
Look how beautiful Nevruz is here.
The mountains came alive, the mountains fell
We're gonna have a lot of work to do.

text: Sen bey hatunusun Sana yılgınlık yakışmaz
english: You're a gentleman's girl. It's not for you to be discouraged.

text: İnşallah yüce rabbim yeniden nasip edecek
english: May the Lord Almighty grant us a return.
Selcan, who am I talking to?
...you'll be in charge of your business.
You're gonna show everyone your face, okay?

text: Kolla kendini obanın her yanında çakallar vardır
english: Watch yourself, there's coyotes all over the oban.

text: Sen o lafları babama nasıl edersin emmi?
english: How could you say that to my father?

text: Seni her zaman baş tacı eden…
…bütün ithamlara rağmen senin arkanda olan adam bunları hak etti mi?
english: Despite all the accusations, did the man who was behind you deserve this?
How many times have you fought together?

text: Defalarca hayatımı kurtaran o büyük adam
english: The great man who saved my life many times
...if it were up to Gunhan's soldiers...

text: Süleyman Şah da biz de biterdik
english: We'd be finished, Solomon Shah and we'd be finished.

text: Bunun tek sebebi de babanın inadıyla Ertuğrul’un dik başlılığı
english: The only reason is because of your father's stubbornness.

text: Ertuğrul o kızın peşine düştüğü günden beri…
english: Ever since Ertugrul went after that girl...

text: …bizim de obanın da burnu pislikten çıkmaz oldu
english: Both us and the oban are stuck in the dirt.

text: Bu senlik benlik kavgası değil evlat
english: This isn't you fighting over me, son.
How long is this gonna take?
Ertugrul stood up to the jihan...

text: …şehzade kızını döşeğine atana kadar kaç can daha vereceğiz?
english: ...how many more lives are we going to give until we put the prince's daughter on her bed?
He was supposed to marry the so - called Gokçe
What about the baby dying, huh?

text: Yoksa Ertuğrul’a beylik yolunu açmak için birileri kazan mı kaynatır?
english: Or will someone boil the boiler to open the way for Ertugrul?

text: O bebeği senelerdir beklediniz Ne oldu?
english: You've been waiting for that baby for years. What happened?
The people closest to Ertugrul killed her baby
If Ertugrul takes the prince's daughter...

text: Hele bir de El Aziz’i ikna edip haklı çıkarsa var ya…
english: And if he convinces El Aziz, and he's right...

text: …Oğuzları da peşine takacak kadar kudretli olur
english: ...and he'll be strong enough to get the boys to come after him.

text: Ama bu onu hangi cehenneme sürükler onu bilemem
english: But I don't know where the hell that puts him.
I'd do anything for the future of the club.

text: Kayıların geleceği babanın Ertuğrul’a olan zaafına ve…
english: The future of the apricots is your father's weakness for Ertugrul, and...
...is too precious to be left to your brother's whim.

text: Bu kıymetin yükü de senin omuzlarındadır
english: The burden of this treasure rests on your shoulders.
I want the truth from you...

text: Allah’tan başka hiç kimseye hizmet etmeyiz Emir Hazretleri
english: We serve no one but God, Your Highness.
...the most painful thing I've ever seen in my life...
And you're the most pathetic truth.

text: Yanında olan kim varsa ya zindana attın…
english: Whoever was with you, you threw them in the dungeon...

text: Allah seni ıslah etsin El Aziz
english: May God set you right, El Aziz.

text: Efendim, bu Ertuğrul’un hemen ölmesi gerek
english: Sir, this Ertugrul will have to die immediately.

text: Eğer öyle bir şey olursa Titus hepsini öldür dedi
english: If that happens, Titus says kill them all.

text: Eğer işler ters giderse hepsini öldürün
english: If things go wrong, kill them all.
You may not die here today, Ertugrul.
...if you tell me how you serve the temples...
Take the Oban and get off my land.
I only want one thing from you...
Because it's the truth that you want...
...the words of lies and lies, Your Highness.

text: Eğer o yalanlarla süslü lafları sana verirsem…
english: If I give you all those lies and fancy words...
I'll save myself and my oba.

text: Lakin öyle bir pisliğin içine battın ki…
english: But you're in such a mess...

text: Allah beni öyle bir zayıflıktan korusun
english: May God protect me from such weakness.
I'll die in the way of God
And I'm not afraid of that at all.
If you don't feel sorry for yourself...
Look at the state he's in because of you.
When I'm going to be a Ayyubi maiden...

text: Sen nasıl aşağılık bir adamsın ha!
english: What a despicable man you are!
What a despicable man you are!
You will die here today, Ertugrul.

text: Ama senin o pis kanın benim ellerime değmeyecek
english: But your filthy blood won't touch my hands.
♪ Build a gallows ♪ ♪ He'll hang and die ♪

text: Selahattin Kervansarayı’nda Nasır’ın Türkmenlerle giriştiği isyan…
english: The rebellion that Nasir took with the Turkmen in the Selahattin caravan...
I took him to the oba.
What you said to my face

text: …komutanlarının yanında söyleyecek cesaretinin olmadığını biliyordum Nasır
english: I knew you didn't have the guts to say it in front of your commanders, Nasser.
Don't call my master a liar!

text: Biz senin ne halt olduğunu biliyoruz Nasır
english: We know what the hell you are, Nasser.

text: Sen elimizde olduğun için ordular da saldıramayacaklar
english: Since we have you, the armies won't be able to attack.

text: Hem zaten Tapınakçı efendilerin Eftelya’ya yaptığı gibi…
english: Besides, it's like the Templar Masters did to Eftelya.

text: Eyyubilerin bütün emirleri bir olup obanızı yerle bir edecekler
english: All the orders of the Jobs will be one and they will destroy your obama.
They won't let any of you live, Ertugrul.
You've taken Islam under your feet

text: O pis ağzına İslam’ın adını alma soysuz köpek!
english: Don't take the name of Islam in that filthy mouth of yours, you degenerate dog!

text: İki değerli komutanından bir tanesi elimde…
english: I have one of his two valued commanders...

text: O zaman buyur gel sana bir ayran aşı ikram edelim
english: Then come on, let's offer you a buttermilk shot.

text: Eğer Gündoğdu Nasır’ı getirmeseydi obamız biterdi
english: If Gündü hadn't brought Nasir.. ..we'd be out of obas.
The army of El Aziz is right under our noses.

text: Şimdilik durdular Ama her an saldırabilirler
english: They've stopped for now, but they can attack at any moment.

text: Bunun sorumluluğu da senin üzerinde olur Süleyman Şah…
english: You'll be responsible for this, Suleyman Shah...
Not Ertugrul, who caused us all this trouble.
What am I supposed to do, Kurdoglu, huh?

text: Oğlumu önlerine atıp diş geçirmelerini mi seyredecektim?
english: Throw my son in front of them and watch them tooth him?

text: Ya da Haçlı tezgahına oğlumun kanını mı verseydim?
english: Or should I have given my son's blood to the Crusader counter?

text: Beylik makamında sen varsın beyim Bu senin takdirindir
english: You're in the office, sir. It's your discretion.

text: Ben Alplerini cenk için hazır ederim
english: I'll prepare the Alps for battle.

text: Hepsi de ölmek için senden emir beklerler
english: They're all waiting for you to order them to die.
We're not going to fight this war on the Obada.
We'll do it by attacking our enemies outside the Obana.

text: …kendilerinden dört kat daha kalabalık bir orduya saldıracak
english: ...is going to attack an army four times as large as they are.

text: …ne avratları bu işin sonunun nereye gideceğini bilecek
english: ...what kind of cunts know where this is gonna end up?

text: Hadi diyelim komutanlarını esir aldık, savaşı durdurduk
english: Let's say we take their commander prisoner, stop the war.

text: El Aziz’in ne yapacağını nereden bileceğiz?
english: How do we know what El Aziz will do?

text: Böyle giderse çok yakında açlıktan kırılmamız da yakındır
english: At this rate, we'll be starving soon enough.

text: Ve bütün bunların sorumlusu sensin Süleyman!
english: And you're responsible for all this, Solomon!

text: Öyle mi? Çocukluğumdan beri senin yanındayım…
english: I've been with you since I was a kid...

text: …bir günden bir güne sana kötü söz ettim mi?
english: Have I spoken ill to you in one day?
I said to your face what I said.

text: Bir gün arkandan kuyunu kazdım mı?
english: Did I dig you up one day?

text: Hayır. Hep senin için obamız için cenk ettim
english: No, I've always fought for you for our oba.
I gave my woman's children's lives to the Mongols.
It's like none of this ever happened.
I'm tired of being exposed to the slanders of Ertugrul.
How many times have we been stabbed in the back?

text: Hep senin dik kafalı oğlun Ertuğrul yüzünden
english: It's all because of your stubborn son, Ertugrul.

text: Artık bu işim böyle gitmeyeceğini bilmelisin Süleyman!
english: You must know that this is no longer the case, Solomon!

text: Ertuğrul’un vesveseleri yüzünden bu zor zamanda bizi bırakıp gitmemeli
english: He must not leave us in this difficult time because of Ertugrul's delusions.

text: Ona biat eden beylerin desteğini kaybedersek…
english: If we lose the support of the gentlemen who promised him...
...this duality will bring our obas to ruin.
...it's time for peace to come to our oba.
I'm not mad at my brother.
...and as his father, it's up to you.

text: Bilirsin, nicedir benim lafımı dinlemez oldu
english: You know, he hasn't listened to me in a long time.
Ertuğrul will come with good news.

text: Görmez misin o Halime’yi almaya gitti
english: Can't you see he's gone to get Halima?

text: Ertuğrul bu kadar zayıf mı yani?

english: Is that what you want to call me?

text: Ne yapacağını bilemeyecek kadar yoldan çıkmış vaziyette
english: He's too twisted to know what to do.
We don't know what we're gonna be.

text: O kız yüzünden obayı unutursa hiç şaşırma
english: Don't be surprised if he forgets the oba because of that girl.
My lord, if Halima brings him to Oba...
We draw the wrath of El Aziz.

text: Bir kız yüzünden tüm cihanı kendimize düşman ederiz
english: Because of a girl, we turn the whole jihad against ourselves.

text: Bir daha ne zaman hamile kalır kim bilir?
english: Who knows when she'll get pregnant again?

text: Onun içindir ki yeni bir eş aramanın vakti gelmiştir
english: That's why it's time to look for a new wife.
Sir, if anything happens to you...
The company departs from the sons of Solomon Shah.

text: Bunun için de Ertuğrul’u tez zamanda evlendirmek lazım
english: To do so, we must marry Ertugrul soon.
He must have a son at sunrise.

text: Hâlâ inat ediyorsun değil mi Halime’m?
english: You're still stubborn, aren't you, Halima?

text: Hâlâ o adamın hain olduğunu kabullenemiyorsun, değil mi?
english: You still can't accept that he's a traitor, can you?
Come on, I beg you, he's innocent.

text: …Halime Sultan’ı hayalinde bile göremeyeceği zindanlarda çürütürüm
english: ...Halime Sultan will rot in dungeons he'll never dream of.

text: İslam dünyasında sebep olacağın felaketleri düşün
english: Think of the disasters you're going to cause in the world of Islam.
Think of the innocent blood that will flow
I want to know the truth, Ertugrul.

text: Yalanın kölesi olamayacak kadar çok sevdim seni Halime Sultan
english: I loved you too much to be a slave to a lie, Sultan Halima.
Don't be sorry I'm gonna die.
In my last breath, the testimony of God in my mouth...
I'll die in my heart with your love.

text: …benim bu dünyaya kefenimle gömüldüğüm gündür Ertuğrul Bey
english: ...the day I was buried in this world with my shroud, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Sana kavuşmak için her gün dua edeceğim
english: I'll pray every day to meet you

text: Ölürken bile son nefesimde sen olacaksın
english: Even when I die, you will be my last breath.

Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh.

text: Ben size peşimden gelmeyin demedim mi?
english: Didn't I tell you not to follow me?
Sir, we're going for a ride. We're going for a ride.
Oh, the next thing we know, you're...

text: Tapınakçıların bütün Halep'i bir cerahat gibi
english: All the Templars' Aleppo is like a plague

text: sardığını kendi gözlerinle gördün Emir Hazretleri
english: You saw it wrapped with your own eyes, Your Highness.
These soldiers who protect my life
The one you gave all your money to
Abu Hisham, as you call him a merchant.

text: Ama bütün bu cerahati hâlâ temizleme şansımız var Emir Hazretleri
english: But there's still a chance we can clear all this up, Your Highness.
When you don't give it to your people

text: kıyameti bekle diye buyurmuş Peygamber Efendimiz
english: The Prophet has commanded you to wait for the apocalypse
Leave it to the people, Your Highness.
He expects good news from you.

text: Sevenleri ölümün bile ayıramayacağını gösterdin bana Ertuğrul Beyim
english: You've shown me that even death can't separate the loved ones, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Allah seni başımdan hiç eksik etmesin Halime Sultan
english: May God never spare you, Halima Sultan.
I'll turn over the entire command to Atabeim Shaabettin.
Get the army to Aleppo immediately.
Let my ancestor give it to me as hard as he can.

text: Süleyman Şah'a da bizzat özürlerimi iletesin
english: Give my personal apologies to the king of Solomon.
May God forgive you for your sins.

text: Kolyeyi bizzat Sultan Alaeddin'e sen götür
english: Take the necklace to Sultan Alaeddin himself.
He's at the palace for now.
You have to kill him too, Afshin.
I don't have one, my prince.
But I know someone who does.
I can take you to him.

text: Yapacağımız her şeyi yaptık Kardinal Hazretleri
english: We've done everything we can, Your Eminence.
Our organization in Jerusalem, Aleppo, Tebriz

text: kısa bir zamanda büyük yol aldığımızı siz de takdir edersiniz
english: You'll appreciate that we've made a great journey in a short time.

text: Yakında o iş de bitecek Kardinal Hazretleri
english: It'll be over soon, Your Eminence.

text: Türkmenlerle Babaileri birbirine düşürmek için yaptığımız hazırlıklar
english: The preparations we made to turn Turkmen and Babais against each other
If Ertuğrul doesn't get in your way

text: Halep ordusu Kayı Obası'nı kuşattı efendim
english: Aleppo's army has surrounded the Kayyan Obama, sir.

text: Artık Kayılar bir mesele olmaktan çıkacaktır
english: The Apricots will be no longer an issue.

text: kutsal emanetini bana getireceğini söylüyorsun Petruccio
english: You say you'll bring me your relic, Petruccio.
If you don't keep your promise to me
How can I call you on duty?
If you want the heroic knights of Christ gone
What is this sacred relic, my lord?
I want you to take a closer look at the Cardinal.
I need to know every step he makes.

text: Sana karşı bastıramadığı hisleri olduğu muhakkak
english: He certainly has feelings for you that he can't hold back.
That way he'll stay away from my nephew.

text: Bizi aptal yerine koyuyor bu küstahlar!

english: The blood and trust of Ibn Al-Arabi (Arabi)

text: Bu Ertuğrul'u en başında öldürmeliydik efendim
english: We should have killed Ertugrul in the first place, sir.
I'm afraid you were right, Titus.
He single-handedly destroyed our organization in Aleppo.

text: Yıllardır emek verdiğimiz her şeyi bir anda yıkıp geçti
english: Everything we've worked for for so many years just tore it apart.
Things I'm afraid to even think about

text: Süleyman Şahım benim kim olduğumun sizin karşınızda zerrece bir önemi yoktur

text: Siz benim ailemin hayatını kurtarmak için hiçbir vakit gözünüzü budaktan esirgemediniz
english: You never took your eyes off the tree to save my family's life.

text: Bu yüzden her daim gönlümde baba olarak göreceğim bir beysiniz
english: That's why you're the kind of man I'll always look up to as a father in my heart.
Hayme Ana will take care of you.

text: gözü dönmüş düşmanın elinden kurtaran bey
english: The man who saved us from the furious enemy.
He must have brought her to the tent.
He told the kefere with his sword

text: Ne diyorsun ulan sen? O dediğin ancak masallarda olur
english: What the fuck are you talking about?

text: Bakalım Selcan Hatun yine ne haltlar edecek?
english: Let's see what Selcan Hatun's up to now.

text: Büyük başın büyük derdi olur kardeş
english: Big head's got big problems, bro.

text: Öyle açım ki bulsam, koca deveyi indiririm alimallah
english: I'm so hungry that if I find it, I'll bring down the giant camel.

text: Hey maşallah be. Yalnız önce şeyhleri bir çadıra yerleştirelim
english: Let's put the sheiks in a tent first.

text: ondan sonra da diyorum şu Nasır'ı bir ziyaret etsek
english: After that, I say we pay Nasser a visit.
Let him hear from us that his death is coming
Then we'll eat until it explodes.

text: Beyim müsaadeniz olursa komutan Günhan sizinle görüşmek istiyor
english: Sir, if you'll excuse me, Commander Günhan would like to see you.
What's with the sword this time?
You didn't sneak up on us.

text: ve oba ahalisinden özürlerimizi kabul etmenizi istirham etmeye geldim
english: And I'm here to ask the community to accept our apologies.

text: Emir Hazretleri namına da özürlerimizi arz ederim
english: And on behalf of His Highness, I offer our apologies.

text: Tez elden obanızı muhasara eden ordumuz çekilecektir
english: We'll withdraw our army, who'll cover you from hand to hand.

text: Ve bu çekilme esnasında neden olduğumuz zararlar karşılanacaktır
english: And the damage we caused during this withdrawal will be compensated.

text: Emir Hazretleri mektubunda beraatınızı ilan etmiş
english: His Excellency has declared your acquittal in his letter.

text: Ve çekilme esnasında orduya komuta etmenizi emretmiş
english: And he ordered you to command the army during the withdrawal.

text: Ee, bu Nasır iblisi ne olacak?
english: So, what about this Nasser demon?
We didn't want our pole to die without seeing us.
You've heard from the sentries, Nasser.

text: El Aziz, Süleyman Şahımıza bir mektup yazmış
english: El Aziz, Süleyman has written a letter to our king.

text: Şair ya, bir döktürmüş bir döktürmüş diyorlar
english: He's a poet. They say he's got a lot on his mind.
And the armies you set upon us
You will beg to die in the hands of the knights.
We can take care of ourselves, God willing.
How would you like to die?

text: Beyimize ettiğin gibi sulu şakalarla mı ölmek isterdin Nasır?
english: Would you like to die with watery jokes like you did with our master, Nasser?

text: Yoksa Eftelya gibi yanarak mı ha?
Yoksa saraya ilk geldiğimiz gün beyimizi uyutup
english: Or we'll put our master to sleep the day we first arrived at the palace.

text: hançerle kıtır kıtır doğramak istediğin gibi mi?
english: Like you wanted to chop it with a dagger?

text: Yoksa kuduz bir köpek gibi ağzından köpükler saçarak mı?
english: Or foaming at the mouth like a rabid dog?
From the great mountains of Ötügen
Since the day we set out
How many enemies have we fought?
How many tyrants have we defied?
Today is the day of Islam.
He was trapped against each other.
The army of Genghis bandits is Semerkant
Buhara and many of our holy cities
The Crusaders have been around for years.
♪ Come down on us like rain ♪

text: Ahval bu kadar çetinken biz ise birbirimize düşeriz
english: We'll be at each other's throats when he's so tough.
May my Lord not destroy the brotherhood of all Islam.

text: Cihan bizden yeni bir diriliş bekler
english: Jahan expects a new resurrection from us

text: Adalet baki olsun kardeşlik bozulmasın diye
english: Let there be justice, so that the brotherhood doesn't break.
Other than that, our misdemeanors won't stand in the way.

text: Bundan gayrı savunma yok, fütuhat var
english: There's no other defense, there's a fugue.

text: Her daim cenk için hazır olun
Halep'te sana zulmeden bu adamın cezasını sen kes
english: You punish this man who has persecuted you in Aleppo.
Whoever has the sword has the victory.

text: Zaferi kazanan beyliği de alırmış Gündoğdu
english: The winner of the victory takes the title, too. It's dawn.
God is the best of the spoils.

text: Bu kulunun da günahlarını af eyle
english: Forgive the sins of this servant
